DOC.brief_summary: Untreated Obstructive Sleep Apnea Syndrome ( OSAS ) long-term complication , namely metabolic imbalance ( obesity , dislipidemia , type 2 diabetes mellitus ) . Until , molecular marker physiopathological connection identify . This project aim determine non-invasive biomarkers may allow good comprehension metabolic consequence OSAS , well assess effect Continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) metabolic parameter . This project integrate clinical , metabolic , genetic/proteomic biologic system explore mechanism behind OSAS , well effect treatment CPAP .
